# metaanalysisT2D

This repository contains all code used for the PROSPERO [CRD42025648346](https://www.crd.york.ac.uk/PROSPERO/view/CRD42025648346) meta-analysis (proteomic biomarkers for T2D).

Clone the repository to access locally to all the scripts and material: [https://jgcurras.shinyapps.io/metaanalysisT2D/](https://jgcurras.shinyapps.io/metaanalysisT2D/).
